oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baptist Memorial Physicians' and Surgeons' Building (2)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Baptist Memorial Hospital and Physicians’ and Surgeons’ Building, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image with vehicles and pedestrians in front of building.

“Baptist Memorial Hospital -- The South’s Greatest Hospital. The Most Complete Service of any Hospital in the United States. Five Hundred Beds, Splendid Hotel, Doctor’s Office Building, Grill, Drug Store, Barber Shop, Beauty Shop, Flower Shop – All Under One Roof and a Garage Adjoining[Typed/Pre-printed] -- Miss Edna Sewing -- 2349 St Louis Ave -- St. Louis, MO -- June 30 -- Greetings to all -- from Memphis -- Mother and I are -- keeping house for -- Louis while his -- family is in St. -- Louis. Will be -- home next Friday -- E. Becht [Handwritten]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baptist Memorial Hospital; Baptist East; Walnut Grove; hospitals; medicine;
